Cougar Crest Trail.address: 40650 North Shore Drive , 0.6 miles west of Big Bear Discovery Center , Big Bear Lake , CA
reviewComments: What an amazing trail! You get an exhilarating workout as well as some of the best views of the bear valley. The best part is joining the Pacific Crest Trail!
